name: Notix – Web Push Notifications
author: Notix

sections.description:
Push notifications are popular among website owners, marketers and content makers for a reason.

They ensure wide audience reach as well as increase your retention rates, impressions, engagement and sales.

Company

NOTIX is the advanced audience re-engagement service that allows you to send both in-app and web push, as such – getting to the screens of your audience whether they use mobile devices or desktop. Whether you own a website, run a business, or work as an affiliate, we’ve got you covered.

Monetization with Notix is easy: you can earn from your push subscribers and send notifications controlling their frequency and setting various ad categories. Mind that we check all the ads carefully to make sure they are 100% brand-safe! To activate this feature, just get in touch with our team.

With a remarkable 30% improvement in push subscriber collection and a 30% higher message delivery rate, NOTIX paves the way to skyrocketing your conversion rates. We help you connect with a wider audience, ensuring your business reaches its full potential.

Pricing

Try it for free: you can use a free NOTIX plan in case your subscriber base is fewer than 30,000 or request a monetization plan if your base is larger. Explore our pricing plans here.

Features

  • In-app monetization: reach your mobile app users with vibrant push and interstitial promos and scale your retention efforts.

  • On-site monetization: send instant on-screen updates, news, and promotions to your website visitors and ensure maximum engagement.

  • Parallel testing and database migration: if you already have a push provider but want to try NOTIX, make your decision as objective as possible. Test them together and make a choice. Then, transfer all of your existing subscribers to NOTIX for free!

  • RSS Feed: make your RSS Feed more advanced and flexible – turn it into push notifications and send immediate messages to subscribers.

  • Triggered Push: send action-based alerts that fit your users’ behavior to catch them when they are most ready to act.

  • Updates and news categories subscription: if you have a large resource divided into themed sections, offer your subscribers to choose those that interest them the most to bring them maximum value.

  • Flexible integration: whether you’re a developer or not, NOTIX offers versatile integration options, including an API, WP plugin, and SAAS.

  • Database flexibility: we cater to businesses of all sizes, offering seamless database management for both individual and corporate clients.

  • GEO-targeting: target your audience effectively with location-based notifications. Perfect for promoting nearby events, stores, and more. City-level targeting is also available.

  • Device targeting: reach your audience on both desktop and mobile devices, always with user consent. It’s a powerful way to boost engagement.

  • Segmentation & automation: customize your push notifications with criteria like language, region, subscription period, platform, and more. Automate messages to save time.

  • Real-time statistics: analyze the success of your push notifications with ease. Identify high-read and high-click-through notifications to fine-tune your messaging.

Discover the numerous possibilities with NOTIX and elevate your notifications to a whole new level!

Languages

  • English
  • Spanish (es_ES) 99%
  • Portuguese (Brasil) (pt_BR) 60%

Community

Join our LinkedIn Community for news and guidelines.
Subscribe to our YouTube channel to get comprehensive video instructions and tips from our experts.
And don’t forget to rate and support us on WordPress.
sections.installation:
1. Install Notix from the WordPress.org plugin directory or by uploading the Notix plugin folder to your wp-content/plugins directory.
  2. Activate the Notix plugin from your WordPress settings dashboard.
  3. Open Notix plugin settings on left side menu.
  4. Follow the instructions on the plugin page.

sections.reviews:
The plugin looked interesting but is buggy and should be discontinued

By Pierre236 (Pierreto) on February 11, 2024

Having unresolved issues with Webpushr, I was thinking of migrating to this plugin, but they no longer take new registrations.

The plugin invites you to go to another provider, so they'll probably end the service.

Anyway, I gave it a try because I already had an account but never used it.

I followed the instructions, but after installation, the invitation to subscribe to Notifications kept opening on every post, even though I'd already clicked on "Accept Notifications".

So it's tiring for users who have to keep closing the window, and there's no option to prevent the window from opening once users have accepted or not.

So I quickly uninstalled it, but I'm disappointed because they had techniques that made it possible to fight against fake users, unlike Webpushr, where I have 35,000 subscribers but only an average of 350 clicks on articles, so a lot of fake users.

Great push plugin

By oposum on December 8, 2023

We've been using Notix push plugin for over a year now, working great. We've gone over the number of subscribers offered in the free version and they offered a few ads per day to keep using it as free and it works great.

Connection between web account and plugin is seamless, works like a charm.

I Like This Push Notifications Plugin

By sanjay2023 on November 9, 2023

I’ve been using Notix push notification plugin for a 8 Month, and I must say, it’s truly one of the best push notification plugin

best push notification This Time

By ankitaben on November 2, 2023

I've been using Notix push notification plugin for a 6 Month, and I must say, it's truly one of the best push notification This Time

Best Push Notification Plugin

By dindayaljaiswal1974 on October 28, 2023

I am Using Notix already on 6 Month. This is Best Push Notification ,i love notice service

Awsome Plugin - I love it

By Sourav Pan (microbiologynote) on October 27, 2023

I've been on the hunt for a reliable web push notification plugin for my WordPress site, and "Notix" has exceeded all my expectations. Not only does it offer seamless integration and user-friendly features, but the ability to monetize my push notifications is a game-changer. The monetization feature has opened up a new revenue stream for my website, and the results have been impressive. The notifications are timely, and the click-through rate is commendable. The support team is responsive and always ready to assist. I highly recommend "Notix" to anyone looking to enhance their user engagement and monetize their notifications. Truly a 5-star experience!

Notix - Web Push Notifications is a game-changer for my online presence

By hitzgh on October 26, 2023

This powerful tool has significantly enhanced my website's functionality in remarkable ways:

  1. Visitor-to-Subscriber Conversion: Notix excels in converting casual website visitors into dedicated subscribers. The seamless integration and user-friendly interface make it easy for visitors to opt in. As a result, I've seen a substantial increase in my subscriber base, enabling me to foster a more engaged and loyal audience.
  2. Effortless Updates: With Notix, my subscribers never miss any update on my blog. The instant push notifications ensure that my content reaches them in real-time, keeping them well-informed and engaged. This feature has improved the overall user experience and solidified my readership.
  3. Revenue Generation: Notix has provided an unexpected benefit by helping me generate income from notification ads. This additional revenue stream has been a pleasant surprise, allowing me to monetize my website more effectively while maintaining a positive user experience.

In summary, Notix - Web Push Notifications is an invaluable asset for any website owner. It has transformed the way I connect with my audience, enhancing user engagement, boosting subscriber numbers, and even providing a source of income through notification ads. I highly recommend Notix to anyone looking to take their website to the next level."

Best Web Push Notification Plugin

By mbaffoe on October 26, 2023

I recently had the opportunity to try out the Notix WordPress plugin, and I must say, it's nothing short of remarkable. Notix is a powerful push notification plugin that has greatly enhanced my website's user engagement. From the moment I installed Notix, I was impressed by its user-friendly interface and intuitive setup process. It seamlessly integrated with my WordPress site, and within minutes, I was ready to send push notifications to my visitors.

Best Push Notifications Plugin

By sierraloaded on October 24, 2023

I've been using Notix for over a year now and it's been an excellent tool for sending push notifications and monetization. Compared to two previous plugins I have used, it offers the best service as much as I know.

The monetization tool is also great (although can be improved) for driving revenue while using their notifications service.

Best push notification service Ever

By kishan2003 on October 24, 2023

I've been using this push notification plugin for a year, and I must say, it's truly one of the best

short_description: Bring more repeat traffic to your WordPress site with Notix. Best engine for web push subscribers collection and notifications delivery.
